entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
